intent_atoms.description: Expand the fragment fixture catalog with synthetic samples that stress new traf/tfhd/tfdt/trun parsing paths so the validator, CLI, and exports exercise multi-run edge cases before assets are promoted into the golden regression set.

New fixtures capture scenarios noted after Task D3: multi-trun runs, negative data_offset, fragments without tfdt, version 0 composition offsets and are registered in the fixture catalog with licensing metadata.
Regression assets are wired into Swift test suites and JSON/CLI snapshot baselines so fragment summaries and validation warnings are asserted end-to-end.
Documentation in the fixture catalog README reflects additional generation profiles or manifest entries required to reproduce new assets locally.
Existing fixture automation generate_fixtures.py already regenerates catalogued assets with checksum enforcement, making it the preferred entry point for expanding fragment coverage.

Use Tests/ISOInspectorKitTests/Fixtures/generate_fixtures.py and its manifest workflow to produce deterministic fragment assets, storing large binaries under documented fixture directories with mirrored license texts.
Update Documentation/FixtureCatalog/manifest.json, Tests/ISOInspectorKitTests/Fixtures/catalog.json and related README guidance to describe new fragment profiles and reproduction commands.

functional_units.name: Generate Synthetic Fragment Fixtures
functional_units.description: Creates deterministic MP4 fragment assets covering multi-trun runs, negative data_offset, missing tfdt, and default composition offsets via generate_fixtures.py

functional_units.name: Register Fixtures in Catalog
functional_units.description: Adds new fixture entries to catalog.json with licensing metadata and manifest updates

functional_units.name: Update Documentation for New Profiles
functional_units.description: Refreshes README and manifest files to describe reproduction commands and profile details

functional_units.name: Run Fragment Coverage Tests
functional_units.description: Executes Swift test suites (FixtureCatalogExpandedCoverageTests, JSONExportSnapshotTests, FragmentFixtureCoverageTests) to assert fragment summaries and validation warnings end-to-end

functional_units.name: Update CLI Snapshot Baselines
functional_units.description: Refreshes command-line integration snapshots after confirming new fixtures

functional_units.name: Maintain License Texts for Large Binaries
functional_units.description: Stores large binary fixture files with mirrored license texts in documented directories
